module.name: external_item_identification_assignment
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to establish the identification of externally defined items. The identification of the externally defined item involves the specification of a location in a physical or digital storage system.

inscope.li: assignment of external locations to items.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the assignment of external locations.

uof.name: External_Item_Identification_Assignment
uof.description: The External_Item_Identification_Assignment UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of supporting the requirement to establish the identification of externally defined items. The identification of the externally defined item involves the specification of a location in a physical or digital storage system.
